metadata.mission: Consolidate 10 SDD skills into 5 core user-invoked skills plus 1 optional utility to reduce cognitive overhead

metadata.description: Absorb sdd-plan-review, sdd-modify, and sdd-validate into sdd-plan
Extract core workflow and key references from sdd-plan-review into new reference files for sdd-plan
acceptance_criteria: plan-review-workflow.md created with core review workflow

metadata.description: Extract core workflow and operations from sdd-modify into reference files
Extract validation workflow and fix patterns from sdd-validate into reference files
Integrate review, modify, and validate into unified planning workflow. Review always runs automatically.
acceptance_criteria: Flow includes automatic AI review step

metadata.description: Remove sdd-plan-review, sdd-modify, and sdd-validate directories
Absorb sdd-update into sdd-next with auto-completion
Extract task lifecycle, progress tracking, journaling, and spec lifecycle from sdd-update into reference files
Integrate auto-completion after implementation. When task is done, automatically mark complete and journal.
acceptance_criteria: Flow shows task:complete and journal:add integration

metadata.description: Remove sdd-update skill directory entirely
Rename sdd-fidelity-review to sdd-review for consistency
Rename sdd-fidelity-review directory to sdd-review
Update name field in frontmatter from sdd-fidelity-review to sdd-review
Update CLAUDE.md and related docs to reflect consolidated skill structure
Update workflow diagram and skill selection table to show 5+1 consolidated skills
acceptance_criteria: Workflow shows: sdd-plan → sdd-next → sdd-review → run-tests → sdd-pr

metadata.description: Update next-cmd skill to reference consolidated skills
Verify consolidated skills work correctly
Verify sdd-plan creates spec with automatic review, modification, and validation
Verify sdd-next implements task and auto-completes with journaling
Verify sdd-review skill activates correctly with new name

journal.title: Task Completed: Create plan-review reference files
journal.content: Created 3 plan-review reference files in skills/sdd-plan/references/: plan-review-workflow.md (5517 bytes - core workflow, review types, decision matrix, MCP tooling), plan-review-dimensions.md (1811 bytes - 6 review dimensions), plan-review-consensus.md (3480 bytes - consensus levels, priority assignment, synthesis algorithm). All acceptance criteria met.
journal.author: foundry-mcp

journal.title: Task Completed: Create modification reference files
journal.content: Created 2 modification reference files in skills/sdd-plan/references/: modification-workflow.md (5026 bytes - core workflow, common workflows, safety features), modification-operations.md (5368 bytes - all 10 operation formats with JSON structures and MCP invocations). All acceptance criteria met.
journal.author: foundry-mcp

journal.title: Task Completed: Create validation reference files
journal.content: Created 3 validation reference files in skills/sdd-plan/references/: validation-workflow.md (4280 bytes - core workflow, commands, exit codes), validation-fixes.md (3788 bytes - auto-fix and manual fix patterns), validation-issues.md (3662 bytes - issue categories, severity, completeness scoring). All acceptance criteria met.
journal.author: foundry-mcp

journal.title: Task Completed: Rewrite sdd-plan SKILL.md
journal.content: Rewrote sdd-plan SKILL.md (298 lines, under 500 limit). Integrated workflow includes: Step 5 automatic AI review, Step 6 modification application, Step 7 validation. All 8 new references linked in Detailed Reference section. Description updated to reflect integrated capabilities.
journal.author: foundry-mcp

journal.title: Task Completed: Delete absorbed skill directories
journal.content: Deleted 3 absorbed skill directories: sdd-plan-review, sdd-modify, sdd-validate. All content has been consolidated into sdd-plan/references/. Verified directories no longer exist.
journal.author: foundry-mcp

journal.title: Task Completed: Create update reference files
journal.content: Created 4 update reference files in skills/sdd-next/references/: task-lifecycle.md (3028 bytes - status transitions, start/complete/block), progress-tracking.md (3212 bytes - estimates, verification), journaling.md (3019 bytes - entry types, best practices), spec-lifecycle.md (2438 bytes - folder structure, activate/complete/archive). All acceptance criteria met.
journal.author: foundry-mcp

journal.title: Task Completed: Update sdd-next SKILL.md
journal.content: Updated sdd-next SKILL.md with integrated auto-completion. Changes: (1) PostImpl now shows task action=complete with auto-journal, (2) MCP table includes journal and lifecycle routers, (3) After implementation section uses direct MCP calls, (4) Completion examples use task action=complete, (5) All sdd-update references removed (0 remaining), (6) New reference files linked in Detailed Reference section.
journal.author: foundry-mcp

journal.title: Task Completed: Delete sdd-update directory
journal.content: Deleted sdd-update directory. Content has been consolidated into sdd-next/references/ (task-lifecycle.md, progress-tracking.md, journaling.md, spec-lifecycle.md). Phase 4 complete.
journal.author: foundry-mcp

journal.title: Task Completed: Rename skill directory
journal.content: Renamed skills/sdd-fidelity-review to skills/sdd-review. Directory verified.
journal.author: foundry-mcp

journal.title: Task Completed: Update SKILL.md frontmatter
journal.content: Updated SKILL.md frontmatter: name changed from sdd-fidelity-review to sdd-review. Phase 5 complete.
journal.author: foundry-mcp

journal.title: Task Completed: Update CLAUDE.md workflow
journal.content: Updated CLAUDE.md workflow diagram from 9-skill chain to simplified 6-skill chain (sdd-plan → sdd-next → sdd-review → run-tests → sdd-pr). Updated skill selection table to show 6 consolidated skills. Removed all references to deleted skills (sdd-plan-review, sdd-modify, sdd-update, sdd-fidelity-review, sdd-validate). Updated Common Workflows section to reflect consolidated skill capabilities.
journal.author: foundry-mcp

journal.title: Task Completed: Update next-cmd references
journal.content: Updated sdd-next references to remove sdd-update dependency. Changed checklist.md, troubleshooting.md, and verification.md to use `task action=\"complete\"` directly instead of `Skill(foundry:sdd-update)`. Also updated sdd-modify reference to sdd-plan and sdd-fidelity-review references to sdd-review. All sdd-update references removed from sdd-next skill directory.
journal.author: foundry-mcp

journal.title: Task Completed: Test sdd-plan workflow
journal.content: Verified sdd-plan has integrated workflow with automatic review, modification, and validation. SKILL.md clearly documents: (1) AI review via review action=spec-review, (2) modification via spec action=apply-plan, (3) validation via spec action=validate/fix. All 16 reference docs present. Fixed stale sdd-update reference on line 63.
journal.author: foundry-mcp

journal.title: Task Completed: Test sdd-next workflow
journal.content: Verified sdd-next implements task workflow with auto-completion and journaling. MCP tooling table includes task router with complete action. Flow diagram shows PostImpl uses task action=complete + auto-journal. Implementation Handoff section (lines 213-223) documents atomic complete behavior. 11 reference docs present including task-lifecycle.md and journaling.md. No sdd-update references remain.
journal.author: foundry-mcp

journal.title: Task Completed: Test sdd-review invocation
journal.content: Verified sdd-review skill activates with new name. Fixed stale references: updated Overview to use sdd-review, updated Skill Family workflow to consolidated 6-skill chain, removed sdd-update from Do NOT use section, fixed example invocation, updated examples.md and integration.md references. Frontmatter correctly shows name: sdd-review. No stale references remain.
journal.author: foundry-mcp
